warnings.message: External stylesheets detected - may be blocked by email clients
warnings.suggestion: Use inline styles instead of external stylesheets
Add H1 heading for proper document structure

correctionsMade: Fixed technical: Missing or incorrect DOCTYPE
Fixed technical: Missing required meta tag: <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8">
Fixed technical: Missing required meta tag: <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
